value.title: How to quickly roll back versions of Azure Logic Apps | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, find out how you could quickly roll back to a previous version of an Azure Logic App. When working with Logic Apps inside of the Azure portal, you may need to go back to a previous version. This video shows you how to do just that.     For more tips and tricks,
